fields.name: Pale Ales
fields.description: Light-colored ales with a hoppy flavor and citrus notes

fields.name: Bitter
fields.description: Traditional British bitter ales with balanced malt and hop flavors

fields.name: IPA
fields.description: India Pale Ales with bold hop flavors and tropical fruit notes

fields.name: Stout
fields.description: Dark, rich beers with roasted malt flavors

fields.name: St. Austell Brewery
fields.description: Founded in 1851, St. Austell Brewery is Cornwall's largest independent brewery, famous for Tribute and other quality ales.

fields.name: Fuller's
fields.description: London's historic brewery since 1845, brewing premium ales including London Pride and ESB.

fields.name: BrewDog
fields.description: Scottish craft brewery founded in 2007, pioneers of the craft beer revolution in the UK.

fields.name: Tribute Pale Ale
fields.description: A classic Cornish pale ale with a fresh, hoppy taste and citrus aroma. Brewed with the finest Cornish water and locally sourced ingredients.
fields.meta_description: Tribute Pale Ale by St. Austell Brewery - Classic Cornish pale ale with fresh, hoppy taste
fields.meta_keywords: tribute pale ale, st austell, cornish beer, pale ale

fields.name: London Pride
fields.description: London's famous premium bitter with a smooth, well-balanced flavor of malt and hops. A true icon of British brewing.
fields.meta_description: London Pride by Fuller's - London's famous premium bitter with smooth, balanced flavor
fields.meta_keywords: london pride, fullers, bitter, london beer

fields.name: Punk IPA
fields.description: A bold, aggressive IPA with tropical fruit flavors and a bitter finish. The beer that started the craft beer revolution in the UK.
fields.meta_description: Punk IPA by BrewDog - Bold Scottish IPA with tropical fruit hops and bitter finish
fields.meta_keywords: punk ipa, brewdog, craft beer, scottish ipa
